data.meta_description: Obituary for Michael  Jerome Wolff |  Michael Jerome Wolff, 46, of Brighton, died at 11:35 p.m. Friday, Oct. 1, 2010, at Alton Memorial Hospital. He was born Nov. 6, 1963, to John and Catherine (Drew) Wolff of Brighton. A 1982...
data.meta_site_name: Michael Wolff Obituary | October 1, 2010 | Anderson Family Funeral Home - Brighton, IL
data.text:
Coping with Grief

We would like to offer our sincere support to anyone coping with grief. Enter your email below for our complimentary daily grief messages. Messages run for up to one year and you can stop at any time. Your email will not be used for any other purpose.
